text: be’ineziyami ayihudawiyani behonuti layi bale t’ifirini hulu irimi aderegini፡፡ kekebiti፣ kefiyelina kebegimi morawochachewini jeribawochachewi weyimi anijetochachewi yeteshekemuti weyimi be’at’initi yetek’elak’elewi (sibi) sik’eri benerisu layi irimi aderegini፡፡ yihinini be’amets’achewi mikiniyati k’et’anachewi፡፡ inya iwinetenyochi neni፡፡
